page.title: 12HOTELS IN HORLEY
page.content: In our area there are 2 small private {hotels}and 1 large one in an international chain, this one has 333 bedrooms, mainly single but there is some family accommodation. These hotels cater mainly for people using Gatwick Airport,and are used for overnight stays rather than for holiday purposes. This also means that they are used to a large extent by foreigners. The large hotel is actually attached to the airport complex, so is easily reached from the terminal buildings. It is also used by Business companies for dinners, meetings, conferences and exhibitions. There are also shops, and a leisure centre there. Of the 2 smaller hotels, one is in a very rural area and also hold discos and caters for weddings. It has large lawns and a lake and the building is very old.
